cells.data: -- takeDirectory :: FilePath -> FilePathon takeDirectory(strPath)	if strPath ≠ "" then		if character -1 of strPath = "/" then			text 1 thru -2 of strPath		else			set xs to init(splitOn("/", strPath))			if xs ≠ {} then				intercalate("/", xs)			else				"."			end if		end if	else		"."	end ifend takeDirector
